original_title: Double Shooting in Padukka Leaves Two Dead
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A double shooting in Thunnane, Padukka, on Sunday night (24th December) left two men dead
According to police spokesperson SSP & Attorney-at-Law Nihal Thalduwa, the shooting occurred within a land designated for an auction.
One victim was found shot inside a vehicle, while the other was discovered deceased nearby.
Authorities confirmed the identity of one victim as a 36-year-old man, while the age of the second victim remains unverified.
